name: Odd/Even

name: Input/Output

name: Absolute Beginner

name: Array

name: Mathematics
description: In a firm there is an intelligent employee. He said that he will not work on all those days which has factors more than 2. You are given with month and year calculate the no of working days of employee.

name: Companies
